name: Mouth Rescue
description:
Play in fullscreen

Discover the world inside your mouth. Created for Ludum Dare 38.

Mouth rescue is a fun Pixel platformer where you play K9, a tooth whose mission is to rescue lost teeth captured by the plaquarmy

Controls

Keyboard 

 Arrow keys,

 Spacebar - Jump 

X - throw Mouthwash,

 B - activate toothbrush

Gamepad- Analog Stick, A - Jump X - throw Mouthwash, B activate toothbrush
